name: Mr. Hamdy Rashad
title: Chairman
bio: Hamdy Rashad is a world-class financial expert and a battle-hardened businessman, with more than 50 years of experience in government and international corporate management. Rashad was a member of the Egyptian presidential advisory body, the National Council for Production and Economic Affairs; and the board of the state-owned Holding Company for Trade and Cotton; Egyptian Financial Supervisory Authority (EFSA) from 2013 to 2017; and 13 other private and public sector companies including Egyptian Sun for Agricultural Development and Alpha Capital for Financial Consulting.

name: Mr. Mohab Zakaria
title: Chief Executive Officer
bio: Mohab Abdelmeguid Zakaria is a graduate of the prestigious Faculty of Economics and Political Science, Cairo University. He is originally from the world of corporate banking where he started his career at CIB Egypt and worked across all departments, and it was where he earned his credit course certification to become a credit officer. He was in charge of the government lending program and worked closely with SMEs and mega-corporates. He led the IPO of Chipsy for Food and PepsiCo, which was among the biggest in Egypt.

name: Mr. Adnan Al Salem
title: Board Member
bio: Adnan Salman Al-Salem is the CEO of Al-Raya United, and is the top representative in all its official and legal dealings. Al-Salem used to be Executive VP of Investments, Head of Banking Group at the state-owned Warba Bank, and Regional Head of branches at Kuwait Finance House (KFH), Kuwait’s largest Islamic Bank. Al-Salem’s experience honed his leadership skills, and prepared him over the years for the mammoth task of leading Al-Raya United, developing its policies and strategies; supervising their implementation; assessing risk, and evaluating performance.

name: Mr. Jassim Al Faji
title: Board Member
bio: Jassim Mohamed H. Al Fajji is the CEO and vice-chairman of Al Raya Holding Co., the mothership of a variety of investments in hotels, real estate, insurance, and oil and gas companies. Faji entered the world of business in 1994 when he opened his company, which was mostly focused on the religious tourism sector, particularly Hajj and Umrah services, hotel management and education. He is also the director and co-founder of Jaddara, which is a hotel development, management and consultancy firm that is wildly successful in Kuwait.

name: Mr. Moustafa Kamal
title: Board Member
bio: Mostafa Kamal Mohamed Hosni is an accounting and finance expert with a professional career spanning 40+ years. His career began at Banque Du Caire in Egypt as an accountant. He then moved to the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, where he served as the Head of Budget Control at Al Riyadh Bank from 1978 till 1990, where he was responsible for all annual financial reports for the bank as a whole.

name: Mr. Attia Salem
title: Board Member
bio: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged.

name: Mr. Ahmed Darwish
title: Board Member
bio: Ahmed Mahmoud Othman Darwish is a prominent university professor at Cairo University’s School of Engineering, where he earned both his Bachelors in Telecommunications and his Masters in Computer Engineering. He has a PhD from California Davis University and is one of Egypt’s most successful telecommunication engineers. Professionally, Darwish served as the Minister of Administrative Development from 2004 to 2011, and was also the Head of the Suez Canal Economic Zone Authority.

name: Mr. Mohamed Gad
title: Board Member
bio: Mohamed Mostafa Gad is one of Egypt’s most revered financial experts. He served as the vice chairman of the country’s investment authority from 2007 to 2009 and as a senior advisor to the planning minister in 2017. He has since become an independent advisor to various esteemed companies and associations. Gad has extensive management experience that dates back to 1980 when he became the Assistant Manager for Investment, Capital Markets and Treasury at the Egyptian American Bank (EAB).

name: Mrs. Azza Saleh
title: Board Member
bio: Azza Saleh is Egypt’s first CFA certified legal accountant and financial analyst, who was the chair of Solutions For Financial Consultancy, a firm that offered consultancies as well as performance assessments, feasibility studies, internal auditing and restructuring services. Saleh headed the preliminary restructuring of Egypt’s vast and vital water and sewage treatment company, which was funded by USAID in 2012.
